page.title: 06Shopping,general,Coleshill.
page.content: Coleshill has a wide variety of shops and services which include food,wine, furniture,jewellery,pet,florists and hairdressers.most people shop in Coleshill but once a month go to a supermarket or hypermarket because many goods are cheaper and there is more choice.They are open later and there are parking facilities.Shops in Coleshill are open most days except Sunday and people shop mainly on Wednesday,Friday and Saturday for groceries.Any special shopping is done in B'ham.There are quite a few"{corner {shops}"where people shop for sweets, cigarettes,fancy goods or anything they need quickly.Most of the shops are small with quite a wide range of articles.Some shops are drab.An asset to the town would be a sports shop, teenage clothes shops, another shoe shop,and more health food shops.
